overview: A dozen neighbors live in an old building at 54 Calle Amparo in Madrid. A Moroccan deaf who cares for another Spanish deaf, an English journalist, a homosexual tattoo artist, a Betty Boop fan grandmother, a Venezuelan illegal immigrant - Each one, in their own way, is witness to the changes in the Lavapi√©s neighborhood, in Spain and in themselves. Time passes for everyone, although at different speeds. Amparo 54 is a window on people's daily life and on how it is affected by socioeconomic processes on a global scale.
title: Amparo 54
